abstract.t: This document proposes requirements for a Remote Direct MemoryAccess (RDMA) Protocol to run on TCP and SCTP transport protocols.An RDMA protocol provides a general facility for extremely highefficiency (low CPU cost per unit of data transferred), end-to-enddata transfer. An RDMA protocol enables high efficiency datatransfer by allowing network interfaces with hardware support forthe RDMA protocol to perform zero-copy data transfer directly amongapplication buffers.
